title: 'Please do not buy this product'
body: Before buying this product I read all the reviews and then thought that this is a good product and went for it. I used it for exactly 2 months, and I'm telling this out of experience, please do not buy it. It's waste of money and energy, the product will work fine for 2-3 days that's it, then everytime you mop, you will get so much dust from the fabric that 2-3 days I thought it's the dust from my floor, but it's actually small particles from the fabric coming out that look like dust and then everytime you have wipe that from the floor by hand or tissue and trust me it's disgusting to do it. They give two fabrics, and the first one tore within 1 month that too with alternative days of use, that's how amazing the product is. Please do not believe all the reviews.

title: 'Not so good'

title: 'Mixed opinions'
body: 'The handle of the bucket broke on first day first time usage itself looking at the broken handle joint it looked very flimsy & poor quality.  Mop is really good though cleans well but I doubt the quality of the mop as well. Gonna wait & see how long it lasts & will update this review accordingly.  From first impressions & usage Worth buying from cleaning perspective 10/10 Build quality wise Mop: 7/10 bucket 4/10  Updat after longer usage: ******To be updated*******'

title: 'Best efficient product'
body: This floor cleaning mop is a game-changer! It's lightweight, versatile, and incredibly easy to use. The adjustable mop head works wonders on various floor surfaces, while the microfiber pads trap dirt effectively. The convenient wringing mechanism ensures quick drying, and the mop is durable and compact for easy storage. If you want hassle-free and efficient floor cleaning, this mop is a must-have!
